derivation: or שְׂמֹאל; a primitive word (rather perhaps from the same as H8071 (שִׂמְלָה) (by insertion of the aleph) through the idea of wrapping up);
outline:
1. the left, the left hand, the left side
    1. left
    2. left hand
    3. north (as one faces east)
strongs_def: properly, dark (as enveloped), i.e. the north; hence (by orientation), the left hand
